game.name: Forsaken Quartet
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The world has been ravaged by a horrible disease. You and three others are the only people left alive on the small island on which you reside.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The world has been ravaged by a horrible disease. You and three others are the only people left alive on the small island on which you reside.

reviewHighlights.text: [h1] 점수 : 8 / 10 [/h1] [h3] 간만에 꽤 꼴리는 NTR 야겜 [/h3] 섬에 괴상한 바이러스가 퍼져 섬 주민 전체가 사망했지만, 그 중에서 살아남은 남녀 4명... 그리고 히로인 둘중 한명을 공략하여 순애를 보든가 아님 금태양한테 NTR를 당하며 섬...
